key_risks: Economic sensitivity to regional downturns, particularly in real estate
Regulatory and compliance risks, including AML and data privacy
Cybersecurity threats and potential data breaches
Competitive pressures from traditional banks and fintech companies
controversies: Allegations of unethical practices, including unauthorized account freezes and fund withdrawals
Customer complaints filed with the BBB
environmental_issues: No significant environmental issues reported; sustainability initiatives in place
social_issues: Customer trust and reputation risks due to ethical concerns and complaints
governance_issues: Complex regulatory compliance challenges, particularly post-merger integrations
